standard.description: These are standards to maintain Accessibility.

test.test_name: Check page JS for on blur events
test.query_clob:
with aap as (select case
                     when (lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE)) like '%blur%'
                           or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE)) like '%focusout%'
                           or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE_ONLOAD)) like '%blur%'
                           or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE_ONLOAD)) like '%focusout%') 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     page_name,
                     application_id,
                     JAVASCRIPT_CODE,
                     JAVASCRIPT_CODE_ONLOAD,
                     created_by,
                     created_on,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     build_option,
                     page_mode,
                     page_id,
						         workspace
            from apex_application_pages)
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses a blur event, which is not accessible', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses a blur event', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
